panels.description: Number of FCM messages sent in the last 1 hour from any point in time. Differs from the actual request count (see batch requests).
panels.title: FCM Send Counts (1h)

panels.description: Number of bot events sent in the last 1 hour from any point in time
panels.title: Bot Event Send Counts (1h)

panels.description: Top 10 endpoints with the most number of HTTP requests over the last 1 hour from any point in time
panels.title: Request Counts (1h)

panels.description: Top 10 endpoints with the most total response time over the last 1 hour from any point in time. Excludes `/api/v3/ws` and `/api/v3/bots/ws`. May not match the actual CPU time due to request coalescing etc.
panels.title: Total Response Time (1h)

panels.description: Top 10 end points with the longest average latency over the last 1 hour from any point in time. Excludes `/api/v3/ws` and `/api/v3/bots/ws`. Calculated by `(total response time) / (request counts)`.
panels.title: Avg Latency (1h)
